verses.name: Job 22:19
verses.text: The righteous see it, and are glad: and the innocent laugh them to scorn.

verses.name: Job 22:20
verses.text: Whereas our substance is not cut down, but the remnant of them the fire consumeth.

verses.name: Job 22:21
verses.text: Acquaint now thyself with him, and be at peace: thereby good shall come unto thee.

verses.name: Job 22:22
verses.text: Receive, I pray thee, the law from his mouth, and lay up his words in thine heart.

verses.name: Job 22:23
verses.text: If thou return to the Almighty, thou shalt be built up, thou shalt put away iniquity far from thy tabernacles.

verses.name: Job 22:24
verses.text: Then shalt thou lay up gold as dust, and the gold of Ophir as the stones of the brooks.
